typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Order ID} as string,
		{Order Date} as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		{Ship Mode} as string,
		Segment as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		Country as string,
		Category as string,
		{Sub-Category} as string,
		Sales as decimal(10,4) '$###,###,###.###',
		Quantity as decimal(10,0),
		Discount as decimal(10,4),
		Profit as decimal(10,4) '$###,###,###.###',
		{Shipping Cost} as decimal(10,4),
		Returns as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> StoreCSV
StoreCSV sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		OrderId = {Order ID},
		OrderDate = {Order Date},
		ShipMode = {Ship Mode},
		Segment,
		City,
		State,
		Country,
		Category,
		SubCategory = {Sub-Category},
		Sales,
		Quantity,
		Discount,
		Profit,
		ShippingCost = {Shipping Cost},
		Returns
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
